stimulusHtml: Which of the following is true of the mechanical work done on the gas?

features.html: A certain quantity of an ideal gas initially at temperature T0, pressure p0, and volume V0 is compressed to one-half its initial volume. As shown above, the process may be adiabatic (process 1), isothermal (process 2), or isobaric (process 3).

choicesHtml: It is the same for processes 1 and 2 and less for process 3.
It is the same for processes 2 and 3 and less for process 1.
It is the same for all three processes.
